comment.author: 14673419@N00
comment._content: translation: Women protest against the prosecution of the 3 Maria's in Portugal at the Portuguese Embassy in The Hague. At the right with hat Ed van Thijn (leader parlementary fraction PvdA), next to him Nel Bar [Banners say: "Women solidarity beyond borders" and "3 Marias Free"] [The case was about three Portuguese women , all with the surname "Maria" and part of the writers group "Poesia 61", who wrote a feministic book titled "Novas Cartas Portuguesas" published in 1972, which was seen as "immoral" and "pornographic" by the then fascisct regime in Portugal ]
